text: ennal dinampiticca manas'sullavar avarumayi kuttukutunnatin titukkam kuttunnatayi kanam. tannalkku valla vipattum vannupettekkumeayenn asankayuntennan atinavar karanam parayuka. ennal allahu ninnalkk nirnayaka vijayam nalkiyekkam. allenkil avanre bhagattuninn marruvalla natapatiyum untayekkam. appeal avar tannalute manas's maraccuvekkunnatine sambandhicc khedikkunnavarayittirum
